text: Brenda Strong (born March 25, 1960 in Oregon) is an American actress who stars primarily in television programs. She has, however, starred in a limited number of movies. She acted as Mary Alice Young in the ABC sitcom Desperate Housewives and as Ann Ewing in the TNT television drama Dallas, the 2012 edition. Before acting, she was crowned Miss Arizona 1980. ==References== Category:Actors from Oregon Category:1960 births Category:Living people
title: Brenda Strong
